Header: 97 School Students in Kilinochchi Get Incentives
Content: Following sponsorship provided by Mr Sarath Chandrasekara and Mrs Sumana Wijerathna, 652 Brigade troops under the 65 Division of the Security Force Headquarters â€“ Kilinochchi (SFHQ-KLN) distributed school accessories to 97 students of low-income groups, learning in Amithiyapuram and Arogyapuram Primary Schools on Friday (2). Brigadier Wasantha Kumarapperuma, General Officer Commanding (GOC), 65 Division was instrumental in getting the coordination of the donation at the request of Brigadier Wanditha Mahinkanda, Commander 652 Brigade. The distribution ceremonies at both schools were chaired by 652 Brigade Commander as the Chief Guest. The gift parcels included school bags, overcoats, underskirts and other garments in addition to accessories.
